communication_preferences.prefers: Executive summaries with optional detail links
sensitivities: Burned by previous dev agency (6-month delay)

business_context.problem_solving: Make therapy more accessible through AI-powered daily check-ins and emotional support
business_context.target_users: Young adults (18-35) seeking affordable mental health support
business_context.success_metric: 100 beta users completing 7-day onboarding, <30s response time

key_decisions.decision: Use Eleven Labs instead of browser TTS for voice (Add, +€1500)
key_decisions.rationale: Client insisted on high-quality, empathetic voice. Browser TTS too robotic.

key_decisions.decision: Simplified onboarding flow from 10 questions to 5 (Swap)
key_decisions.rationale: User testing showed drop-off at question 6. Equal complexity.

key_decisions.decision: Removed 'share with therapist' feature from MVP (Swap)
key_decisions.rationale: HIPAA compliance concerns. Moved to Phase 2. Replaced with 'export journal' PDF.

timeline_adjustments.reason: Eleven Labs API rate limits during testing - needed to request quota increase

change_requests.title: Upgrade to Eleven Labs Professional Voice

communication_history.summary: 30-min call to review scope, timeline, and communication plan. Sarah shared her vision for 'making therapy feel like talking to a caring friend.' Discussed privacy concerns extensively.
client_concerns: Previous agency took 6 months for a 4-week project
Voice quality must feel empathetic, not robotic

communication_history.summary: Sarah requested upgrade to Eleven Labs Professional Voice after hearing demo with browser TTS. Explained Add decision (+€1500). She approved immediately, said 'voice quality is make-or-break for this product.'
communication_history.client_response: Approved Add without hesitation. Very happy we flagged this early.

communication_history.status: Authentication complete, chat interface built, voice integration 50%
communication_history.client_response: Thrilled with progress. Asked if we can do a quick demo before Evidence Sprint. Sent preview link.

communication_history.summary: Sarah tested preview link. Loved voice quality. Noticed users dropping off at onboarding question 6 in her user testing. Requested simplification (10 → 5 questions).
communication_history.client_response: Grateful we could adapt quickly. Said 'this is what I wish the last agency did.'

communication_history.status: Evidence Sprint ready. Demo: Full onboarding flow, AI conversation, voice responses <2s, Stripe subscription flow.
communication_history.client_response: Blown away. Shared demo with her therapist advisor, who was impressed. Small feedback: reduce voice pitch slightly.

communication_history.summary: Sarah's legal advisor raised HIPAA concerns about 'share with therapist' feature. Discussed alternatives. Agreed to replace with 'export journal as PDF' (Swap, equal complexity).
communication_history.client_response: Relieved we could pivot without timeline impact. Approved Swap immediately.

communication_history.summary: All acceptance tests green. Handoff included: deployment credentials, database backup scripts, environment variables, support plan (30-day bug fixes). Sarah ran tests herself, all passed.
communication_history.client_response: Paid invoice within 2 hours. Said 'Best agency experience I've ever had. Will refer you to everyone.'

communication_history.summary: 1-week check-in. Sarah reported 50 beta users onboarded, 92% completion rate (better than expected). No bugs. Users love the voice quality.
communication_history.client_response: Extremely happy. Already thinking about Phase 2 (mobile app). Will send testimonial this week.

working_well: Loves the weekly update format (executive summary + optional detail links)
Grateful for proactive suggestions (Eleven Labs upgrade flag)
Respects our Swap/Add framework (no scope creep attempts)
potential_concerns: Initially anxious about timeline due to previous agency experience
Needed extra reassurance in first 2 weeks
opportunities: Mentioned Phase 3: Integration with therapist portals
Referred 2 colleagues from mental health startup community
Potential case study: willing to be public testimonial

post_delivery.testimonial: Working with ScopeLock was the best agency experience I've ever had. They delivered exactly what they promised, on time, and were incredibly responsive to our needs. The ScopeLock model (pay at AC green) completely eliminated my anxiety about getting burned again. I've already referred them to 3 other founders. 10/10 would work with them again.

went_well: Weekly updates format perfect for time-pressed CEO
Proactive suggestions (Eleven Labs upgrade) built trust early
Evidence Sprint demo was impressive, built momentum
to_improve: Could have flagged HIPAA concerns earlier (came up late at CR-003)
Next time: ask about legal/compliance constraints in kickoff call
